item.description:
** UPDATE ** Contact information, address and directions were mailed to "Yes" and "Maybe" RSVP's at 4pm on Friday. If you are RSVP'ing after that time, email Dani for directions.
_____________________________________________

From NHC regular Dani: Dani's Place - 2008 - Partie Deux

If last month's party is any indication, this will also be gathering of fine folks, sharing fine food (including sushi), music, good cheer and chair dancing optional of course... he he. Join us won't you?? I'm already getting a lot of positive replies!

If you are not sure until the last minute or you want to bring a guest - no worries - all good hearted, fun loving people welcome - the more the merrier!

Contact info for this party, including the address, will be emailed to "Yes" and "Maybe" RSVP's on Friday afternoon. In the meantime, if you have any questions, feel free to email Dani.
item.name: Sat. 2/23 - Party at Dani's Place in West Haven
